info.title: DESCRIPTION
info.body: BOYSEN®® Matte Shield™ is an acrylic, water-based clear matte coating ideally used as a topcoat over any paint finish that needs protection from common household stains. It is particularly useful in maintaining the clean and elegant look of specialty decorative finishes like DECORe™ Classic. This low-odor formulation is designed to provide excellent abrasion resistance ideal for protecting painted surfaces indoors.

info.title: PRINCIPAL USES
info.body: Designed as a protective clear matte topcoat for interior paints including BOYSEN®® DECORe™ Classic.

info.title: SERVICE CONDITIONS
info.body: Wipe off stains using a soft cloth, mild soap and water while applying moderate pressure. Do not use abrasive cleansers as these may damage paint film.

info.title: PAINTING SCHEDULE
info.body: (After application of the BOYSEN®® DECORe™ Classic paint system or other latex paint systems) Apply at least 2 coats of BOYSEN®® Matte Shield™ B‑4600. Resulting finish completely cures after 7 days reaching full stain resistance.
